open_workspace_desc: To open a workspace, you may visit the menu bar's "File" section or simply select one option from below:
workspace_icon_settings_desc: You may change the workspace icon in "settings" later.
err_empty_workspace_name: The workspace name is empty, please specify one.
err_empty_workspace_path: The workspace path is empty, please specify one.
err_log_in_console: An error has occurred, please check the console for log output...
err_invalid_path: Bad luck, we've got invalid path, please try again.
